testCase.name: NavBar component updates the query state when the search changes
NavBar component calls sendQueryToParent when the search button is clicked
App component navigates to Ukraine News when the route is changed
App component navigates to World News when the route is changed
NewsList renders news items after data fetching
NewsList should console.error on failed axios request
NewsList should filter news items by search query
NewsList should set treding words to commoun words
